description: Are you struggling to find success in building an engaging Facebook audience? 1,000 Facebook Fans in 60 Days is the ideal course to help you master Facebook marketing as well as build a strong engaging audience. This course is for business owners, startups, nonprofits, brands and any other organizations looking to grow a strong fan base. This is the only Facebook course on Udemy with a live day by day tutorial to show you how to get 1,000 fans. You will not only learn all the ins and outs of facebook, I will also show you by building a brand new Facebook page from scratch and taking it from zero fans to 1,000 fans in just 60 days. Come join this course as I walk with you hand in hand to help bring Facebook success to your business, organization, or brand!
title: How I Got 1,000 Facebook Fans in 60 Days - Without Ads
